analysis.key_quote: Our jobs are not political, and the work of every day civil servants will only become more and more important as we march towards our own climate driven doom, and the rising fascism of the trump admin, we need people who are willing to stay informed and stay involved.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of civil servants and their non-political roles, while also criticizing the potential negative impacts on the job market and the politicization of government work.
